entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a wizard who is looking for an intruder in the castle. He wants Filch to help him search.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a reluctant participant in Snape's search for the intruder. He is more interested in catching Peeves.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who has been stealing from a student and Filch wants to get him thrown out of the castle.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being looked through by Snape and Filch as they search for the intruder. He is aware that Mrs. Norris can smell him.

entities.name: mrs. norris
entities.description: Mrs. Norris is a cat who can smell Harry and is peering around Filch's legs.

relationships.description: Snape wants Filch to help him search for the intruder.
Filch wants to catch Peeves and get him thrown out of the castle.
